desc: Adirondack's Only Cold Pressed Juice Bottler. Smoothies, Bowls and Salads as well.

layout.text: Cold Pressed Juice..... Natures Perfect Nutrition.

We are a NYS Agriculture and Markets approved producer of cold pressed juices. We believe supporting local farms and a self sustainability model is important, and strive to buy local first. Our juices are 100% cold pressed, naturally raw with zero preservatives, never heated or pasteurized. . . 100% JUICE.
